title: User Login Success
description: Verify user can log in successfully with correct email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login endpoint.
Submit valid email and password.
Verify response contains a valid JWT token and successful login status.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login is rejected with invalid email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to login endpoint.
Submit incorrect email and/or password.
Verify response indicates authentication failure and no JWT token is issued.

title: User Registration Success
description: Verify user can register successfully with valid email and name.

steps.description: Navigate to signup endpoint.
Submit valid email and name.
Verify user account is created and email verification is triggered.

title: Email Verification Process
description: Verify email verification process activates the user account correctly.

steps.description: Complete user signup.
Simulate following email verification link.
Verify user account status changes to verified.

title: OTP Verification for Login
description: Verify user can authenticate using OTP after login credentials.

steps.description: Perform login with valid credentials.
Submit correct OTP to verification endpoint.
Verify user session is authenticated with valid JWT and access granted.

title: Password Reset Request
description: Verify user can request password reset email with valid email.

steps.description: Navigate to forgot-password endpoint.
Submit registered user email.
Verify password reset email is generated and sent.

title: Device Registration Success
description: Verify user can register a new device up to the limit of two devices.

steps.description: Authenticate user and navigate to device registration endpoint.
Submit new device name and device type.
Verify device is registered and listed in user's registered devices.

title: Device Registration Limit Enforcement
description: Verify that registration fails gracefully when user tries to register more than two devices.

steps.description: Register two devices successfully.
Attempt to register a third device.
Verify request fails with appropriate error message indicating device limit exceeded.

title: Device Removal for Login
description: Verify that user can remove a registered device during login device management.

steps.description: Login with multiple registered devices.
Request device removal for one device.
Verify device is removed and no longer listed in registered devices.

title: Retrieve User Progress Data
description: Verify that the progress API returns accurate daily MNZD habit data for the user.

steps.description: Authenticate user and call progress GET endpoint.
Verify response includes correct tracked data for meditation, nutrition, zone, and discipline.

title: Update Daily Progress Successfully
description: Verify user can update daily habit progress for any or all MNZD categories.

steps.description: Authenticate and call progress POST endpoint with date and boolean flags for habits.
Verify progress is saved correctly and retrieval reflects updated values.

title: Progress Update with Partial Data
description: Verify system correctly updates only specified MNZD categories and leaves others unaffected.

steps.description: Send progress update with only meditation and nutrition flags.
Verify zone and discipline progress remain unchanged.

title: AI Notification Test Email Sending
description: Verify the system sends a test AI-powered notification email of specified type successfully.

steps.description: Call notifications test POST endpoint with valid notification type.
Verify system returns success status and email notification is queued or sent.

title: Get User Notification Settings
description: Verify user can retrieve current notification preference settings.

steps.description: Authenticate and call user settings GET endpoint.
Verify response includes current notification preferences such as emailNotifications boolean.

title: Update User Notification Settings
description: Verify user can update and persist notification preferences.

steps.description: Call user settings PUT endpoint with changed notification preferences.
Verify updated preferences are reflected on subsequent GET requests.

title: Retrieve Analytics Dashboard Data
description: Verify analytics API returns accurate visual insights into user's habit data.

steps.description: Authenticate and call analytics GET endpoint.
Verify response includes valid analytics information such as streaks, engagement rates, and milestone data.

title: Save Timer Session Successfully
description: Verify saving a focus timer session with type and duration works as expected.

steps.description: Call timer-data POST endpoint with valid session duration and timer type.
Verify session is saved and server returns success confirmation.

title: Retrieve Timer Session Data
description: Verify saved timer sessions can be retrieved correctly.

steps.description: Authenticate and call timer-data GET endpoint.
Verify response includes all saved timer sessions with correct durations and types.

title: Submit Contact Message Successfully
description: Verify that user can submit a contact message with valid name, email, and message fields.

steps.description: Call contact POST endpoint with valid name, email, and message.
Verify contact message is accepted and stored or forwarded correctly with success status.

title: Contact Form Validation - Missing Fields
description: Verify submission fails with error when required fields are missing in contact form.

steps.description: Call contact POST endpoint omitting one or more required fields.
Verify validation error is returned specifying missing fields.

title: Submit Feedback Message Successfully
description: Verify that user can submit feeback message with appropriate fields.

steps.description: Call feedback POST endpoint with valid data.
Verify feedback is accepted and recorded successfully.
